bug.author: honnibal
bug.summary: Documents parsed with `.pipe()` sometimes serialize into invalid byte strings
bug.description: Not sure what's going on here. Maybe a subtle race condition, although I thought the pipe method should really be lock-free.

comments.comment: Aaah dammit. Some code I wrote ages ago in the thinc library isn't thread-safe. Easily fixed, patch soon.
This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
